Description: Mudstone palette in the shape of a boat.
Curator's comments: Published: A. Roveri and F. Tiradritte [eds.], Kemet: Alle Sorgenti del Tempo, Ravenna 1998, pp.162-163 [66-68]. Shaping the Beginning (Athens 2006), 185, cat no. 130.
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2006. Athens. Shaping the Beginning, 1998. Ravenna, Italy. Museo Nazionale di Ravenna, Kemet: Alle Sorgenti del Tempo,
